front.text: At the start of the game, put 4 tokens in Skitter's bug pool

ul.li: One player may use a power now.
Deal 1 melee and 1 toxic damage to a target.
One player may search their trash for an Equipment card and put it in their hand.

power.name: Leader
power.text: Weaver deals 2 psychic damage to a hero other than Weaver. That hero may play a card

front.text: At the start of the game, put 3 tokens in Weaver's bug pool

ul.li: One player may play a card now.
Deal 2 melee damage to a target.
One player may search their deck for an Ongoing card and put it in their hand.

power.name: Sacrifice
power.text: Destroy any number of Khepri's cards and remove them from the game. For each card destroyed in this way, up to two heroes may use a power (or one hero may use two powers)

front.text: At the start of the game, put 4 tokens in Khepri's bug pool

ul.li: Destroy an environment card. If you do, deal 2 melee damage to a target.
Deal 2 psychic damage to a hero. If they take damage in this way, they may use a power

card.name: Surveying
card.text: Reveal the top 3 cards of the environment deck. Put 1 on top of the environment deck, and 2 on the bottom of the environment deck

card.name: Regroup
card.text: Return each Bug card you control to your hand. Add a token to your bug pool. Play any number of Bug cards

card.name: Bees!
card.text: Deal 2 melee and 2 toxic damage to X targets, where X = the number of tokens in your bug pool

card.name: Delivery
card.text: Draw X cards, where X = the number of tokens in your bug pool

card.name: Situational Awareness
card.text: Whenever a hero target would be dealt 5 or more damage from a single source, reduce that damage by 2

card.name: Always Planning
card.text: Whenever a hero is dealt 5 or more damage from a single source, you may search your deck for a card and put it into your hand. If you searched your deck, shuffle it

card.name: Silk Armour
card.text: Reduce damage dealt to Skitter by 1

card.name: Prepared Threads
card.power: Destroy an Environment or Ongoing card

card.name: Bug Decoy
card.text: When you play this card, remove any number of tokens from your bug pool and place them next to this card. This card has that much HP. Whenever a non-hero target deals damage to a hero target, redirect the damage to this card, When this card is destroyed or returned to your hand, return the tokens next to it to your bug pool

card.name: Swarm
card.text: When you play this card, remove any number of tokens from your bug pool and place them next to this card. This card has that much HP. At the end of your turn, this card deals 1 melee and 1 toxic damage to up to X targets, where X = this target's HP. When this card is destroyed or returned to your hand, return the tokens next to it to your bug pool

card.name: Spiders
card.text: When you play this card, remove any number of tokens from your bug pool and place them next to this card. This card has that much HP. At the end of your turn, this target may deal X toxic damage to 1 target, where X = this target's HP - 1. When this card is destroyed or returned to your hand, return the tokens next to it to your bug pool

card.name: Relay Bugs
card.text: When you play this card, remove any number of tokens from your bug pool and place them next to this card. This card has that much HP. When you play this card, add 4 tokens to your bug pool. When this card is destroyed or returned to your hand, return the tokens next to it to your bug pool, and then remove 4 tokens from your bug pool or from next to other Bug cards

card.name: Tracking Bugs
card.text: When you play this card, remove any number of tokens from your bug pool and place them next to this card. This card has that much HP. Whenever a non-hero target enters play, this target deals it 2 melee and 2 toxic damage, and then deals itself 1 melee damage. When this card is destroyed or returned to your hand, return the tokens next to it to your bug pool

card.name: Atlas
card.text: Skitter is immune to damage from environment cards. At the end of your turn, draw a card. At the end of your turn, this card deals itself 1 psychic damage
